author: Julia Brucculieri
title: Beyonc√© Has Officially Dropped Out Of Coachella And Fans Aren't Happy
text:
Beyonc√© Has Officially Dropped Out Of Coachella And Fans Aren't Happy They'll just have to wait until 2018 to see Bey slay the festival stage. Christopher Polk via Getty Images Bey won't slay the Coachella stage this year. 
Bad news for Beyonc√© fans who bought their Coachella tickets: Queen B has officially pulled out of the music festival. 
On Thursday, a representative for the expectant mother confirmed the news to the Associated Press. In a statement, the rep said Bey, who‚Äôs pregnant with twins, was just ‚Äúfollowing the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months.‚Äù 
Beyonc√© announced her pregnancy about a month after the Coachella lineup was unveiled, leading many to speculate whether she‚Äôd be able to grace the festival with her presence. 
There is a silver lining though ‚Äï Bey will headline the 2018 festival. There‚Äôs been no news yet about who will take her place (let‚Äôs be real, no one can) this year, though. 
The Coachella Twitter account retweeted AP‚Äôs story and shared the news on its official Facebook page, telling fans, ‚ÄúStay tuned for more information.‚Äù 
Naturally, folks aren‚Äôt too happy about the announcement. Many took to Twitter to air their grievances. Beyonc√© isn't performing at Coachella now and I'm praying they find someone better or equally as good as her or I'm demanding a refundüòÖ ‚Äî Kaley Stockton (@k leyyy) February 23, 2017 If anyone wants to go to #Coachella I'm selling my pass ‚Äî BB is COMING (@bree_thecreator) February 23, 2017 I bought my fucking Coachella ticket for nothing.
